attributes.action: 12m Tall 3G Mobile Base Station on Buckingham Drive, Frimley adj. Tintagel drive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A proposal has been put forward by AWA UK on behalf of Ericsson & '3' to build a 12 metre tall Mobile base station on the cobbled area next to the pavement on Buckingham Hill adjacent to Tintagel Drive. 

This is a predominantly residential area, and the base station would dominant the landscape, being far taller than any surrounding structures. Plus the fact that is would be unsightly, and that there are additional potentiel (but as yet unproven) health risks, coupled with potential negative impact on local house prices.

Please support this case, as this really is not an appropriate location for such a structure, especially when there are a number of loal areas e.g. Frimley Fuel Allotments, already used by mobile operators for identical operations. 

Thanks for your time and help in supporting this petition.

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
